external_games.name: The Life of a Pacifist is Often Fraught With Conflict
The Life of a Pacifist is Often Fraught With Conflict

name: The Life of a Pacifist is Often Fraught With Conflict
summary: A short visual novel created by Bento Smile, centered around a game development studio. Like many of Bento Smile's games, this utilizes the Ren'Py engine.
